1: וְאִ֣ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>Now the men</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> נִשְׁבַּ֥ע <sup>7650 </sup> <n>had sworn</n> בַּמִּצְפָּ֖ה <sup>4709 </sup> <n>in Mizpeh</n> לֵאמֹ֑ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>saying</n> אִ֣ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>There shall not any</n> מִמֶּ֔נּוּ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>at</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יִתֵּ֥ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>of us give</n> בִּתּ֛וֹ <sup>1323 </sup> <n>his daughter</n> לְבִנְיָמִ֖ן <sup>1144 </sup> <n>unto Benjamin</n> לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <sup>802 </sup> <n>to wife</n>

19: וַיֹּאמְר֡וּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>Then they said</n> הִנֵּה֩ <sup>2009 </sup> <n>Behold</n> חַג־ <sup>2282 </sup> <n>Behold [there is] a feast</n> יְהוָ֨ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> בְּשִׁל֜וֹ <sup>7887 </sup> <n>in Shiloh</n> מִיָּמִ֣ים ׀ <sup>3117 </sup> <n>year</n> יָמִ֗ימָה <sup>3117 </sup> <n>to year</n> אֲשֶׁ֞ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> מִצְּפ֤וֹנָה <sup>6828 </sup> <n>[in a place] which [is] on the north side</n> לְבֵֽית־ אֵל֙ <sup>1008 </sup> <n>of Bethel</n> מִזְרְחָ֣ה <sup>4217 </sup> <n>east side</n> הַשֶּׁ֔מֶשׁ <sup>8121 </sup> <n>east side</n> לִמְסִלָּ֔ה <sup>4546 </sup> <n>of the highway</n> הָעֹלָ֥ה <sup>5927 </sup> <n>that goeth up</n> מִבֵּֽית־ אֵ֖ל <sup>1008 </sup> <n>from Bethel</n> שְׁכֶ֑מָה <sup>7927 </sup> <n>to Shechem</n> וּמִנֶּ֖גֶב <sup>5045 </sup> <n>and on the south</n> לִלְבוֹנָֽה׃ <sup>3829 </sup> <n>of Lebonah</n>
20: [וַיְצַו כ] (וַיְצַוּ֕וּ <sup>6680 </sup> <n>appoint</n> ק) אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בְּנֵ֥י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the children</n> בִנְיָמִ֖ן <sup>1144 </sup> <n>of Benjamin</n> לֵאמֹ֑ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>saying</n> לְכ֖וּ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>Go</n> וַאֲרַבְתֶּ֥ם <sup>693 </sup> <n>and lie in wait</n> בַּכְּרָמִֽים׃ <sup>3754 </sup> <n>in the vineyards</n>
21: וּרְאִיתֶ֗ם <sup>7200 </sup> <n>And see</n> וְ֠הִנֵּה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>and behold</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>if</n> יֵ֨צְא֥וּ <sup>3318 </sup> <n>come out</n> בְנוֹת־ <sup>1323 </sup> <n>and behold if the daughters</n> שִׁילוֹ֮ <sup>7887 </sup> <n>of Shiloh</n> לָח֣וּל <sup>2342 </sup> <n>to dance</n> בַּמְּחֹלוֹת֒ <sup>4246 </sup> <n>in dances</n> וִֽיצָאתֶם֙ <sup>3318 </sup> <n>then come ye out</n> מִן־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>out</n> הַכְּרָמִ֔ים <sup>3754 </sup> <n>of the vineyards</n> וַחֲטַפְתֶּ֥ם <sup>2414 </sup> <n>and catch</n> לָכֶ֛ם אִ֥ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>you every man</n> אִשְׁתּ֖וֹ <sup>802 </sup> <n>his wife</n> מִבְּנ֣וֹת <sup>1323 </sup> <n>of the daughters</n> שִׁיל֑וֹ <sup>7887 </sup> <n>of Shiloh</n> וַהֲלַכְתֶּ֖ם <sup>1980 </sup> <n>and go</n> אֶ֥רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>to the land</n> בִּנְיָמִֽן׃ <sup>1144 </sup> <n>of Benjamin</n>
22: וְהָיָ֡ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>shall come</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>when</n> יָבֹ֣אוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>come</n> אֲבוֹתָם֩ <sup>1 </sup> <n>And it shall be when their fathers</n> א֨וֹ <sup>176 </sup> <n>or</n> אֲחֵיהֶ֜ם <sup>251 </sup> <n>or their brethren</n> [לָרֹוב כ] (לָרִ֣יב <sup>7378 </sup> <n>adversary</n> ק) אֵלֵ֗ינוּ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to us</n> וְאָמַ֤רְנוּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>that we will say</n> אֲלֵיהֶם֙ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> חָנּ֣וּנוּ <sup>2603 </sup> <n>unto them Be favourable</n> אוֹתָ֔ם <sup>853 </sup> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>because</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>did not</n> לָקַ֛חְנוּ <sup>3947 </sup> <n>unto them for our sakes because we reserved</n> אִ֥ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>not to each man</n> אִשְׁתּ֖וֹ <sup>802 </sup> <n>his wife</n> בַּמִּלְחָמָ֑ה <sup>4421 </sup> <n>in the war</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>because</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> אַתֶּ֛ם <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> נְתַתֶּ֥ם <sup>5414 </sup> <n>for ye did not give</n> לָהֶ֖ם כָּעֵ֥ת <sup>6256 </sup> <n>unto them at this time</n> תֶּאְשָֽׁמוּ׃ <sup>816 </sup> <n>[that] ye should be guilty</n> ס
23: וַיַּֽעֲשׂוּ־ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>did so</n> כֵן֙ <sup>3651 </sup> <n>so</n> בְּנֵ֣י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>And the children</n> בִנְיָמִ֔ן <sup>1144 </sup> <n>of Benjamin</n> וַיִּשְׂא֤וּ <sup>5375 </sup> <n>and took</n> נָשִׁים֙ <sup>802 </sup> <n>[them] wives</n> לְמִסְפָּרָ֔ם <sup>4557 </sup> <n>according to their number</n> מִן־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>who</n> הַמְּחֹלְל֖וֹת <sup>2342 </sup> <n>of them that danced</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>whom</n> גָּזָ֑לוּ <sup>1497 </sup> <n>whom they caught</n> וַיֵּלְכ֗וּ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>went</n> וַיָּשׁ֙וּבוּ֙ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>and returned</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> נַ֣חֲלָתָ֔ם <sup>5159 </sup> <n>unto their inheritance</n> וַיִּבְנוּ֙ <sup>1129 </sup> <n>and repaired</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הֶ֣עָרִ֔ים <sup>5892 </sup> <n>the cities</n> וַיֵּשְׁב֖וּ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>and dwelt</n> בָּהֶֽם׃
24: וַיִּתְהַלְּכ֨וּ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>departed</n> מִשָּׁ֤ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n> בְּנֵֽי־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>And the children</n> יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> בָּעֵ֣ת <sup>6256 </sup> <n>thence at that time</n> הַהִ֔יא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> אִ֥ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>every man</n> לְשִׁבְט֖וֹ <sup>7626 </sup> <n>to his tribe</n> וּלְמִשְׁפַּחְתּ֑וֹ <sup>4940 </sup> <n>and to his family</n> וַיֵּצְא֣וּ <sup>3318 </sup> <n>and they went out</n> מִשָּׁ֔ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n> אִ֖ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>from thence every man</n> לְנַחֲלָתֽוֹ׃ <sup>5159 </sup> <n>to his inheritance</n>
25: בַּיָּמִ֣ים <sup>3117 </sup> <n>In those days</n> הָהֵ֔ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>those</n> אֵ֥ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>there</n> מֶ֖לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>[there was] no king</n> בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>in Israel</n> אִ֛ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>every man</n> הַיָּשָׁ֥ר <sup>3477 </sup> <n>[that which was] right</n> בְּעֵינָ֖יו <sup>5869 </sup> <n>in his own eyes</n> יַעֲשֶֽׂה׃ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>did</n>
